rukus.text: Alipha-lama-raa, e'ibora haiche mahagrantha arau suspasta kora'anara ayata
Kaphirasakale eta samayata akanksa karaiba ye, yadi sihamta mumina ha’lehemtena
Erai diya sihamtaka, sihamta kha'i thakaka arau bhoga karai thakaka, arau asa-akanksa'i sihamtaka gaphila karai raakhaka, eteke acirae'i sihamte janiba paraiba
Arau ami yi janapadake'i dhbansa karaicho tara babe eta nirdista kala lipibad'dha achila
Kono jatiye tara nirdista (dhbansara) kalaka aguraa'i aniba noraarae arau pichuraa'i'o niba noraarae
Arau sihamte kaya, ‘heraa manuhajana! Yara prati yikira aratirna haiche, niscaya tumi ejana unmada’
Yadi tumi satyabadisakalara antarbhukta tente amara ocarata phiraista upasthita nakaraa kiya
ami phiraistasakalaka yathartha karanabihina praerana nakarao, arau (phiraistasakala upasthita ha’le) tetiya sihamta arakasa'o napalehemtena
Niscaya amiye'i kora'ana aratirna karaicho arau arasye amiye'i iyara samraksaka
Arasye ami tomara purbe atita sampradayasamuhara majata raachula praerana karaicho
Arau sihamtara ocarata ene kono raachula aha na'i yaka sihamte upahasa karaa nachila
E'idarae'i ami aparaadhisakalara antarata seya sancara karao
ihamta kora'anara prati imana posana nakaraiba, arau arasye para haiche purbarartisakalara raiti
Arau yadi ami sihamtara babe akasara duraara khuli dilohemtena, arau sihamta tata araohana karaile haya
tathapi'o sihamta ka’lehemtena ye, ‘amara drsti sanmohita karaa haiche, baram ami eta yadugrasta sampradaya’
